thread.title: Clark Street Bread Bakes Up a New Sandwich Stall at Grand Central Market

author: Farley Elliott
title: Clark Street Bread Bakes Up a New Sandwich Stall at Grand Central Market

text:
The popular bakery is getting into the breakfast and lunch game
Things are ratcheting up at Clark Street Bread inside Grand Central Market. The longtime takeaway bread and pastry option has just quietly opened a more substantial stall right by Eggslut, and they’ve expanded their menu as a result.
Head down there today and you’ll find a full case of glutenous delights to enjoy, from those familiar loaves to sandwiches an an array of toasts. You can find the current soft-opening breakfast and lunch menu below.
As of this week, Clark Street Bread at GCM is open daily from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m., with Zack Hall himself possibly kicking around the joint. When he’s not there, expect the full-time baker to be at his commercial space, or working on his upcoming standalone Echo Park space , which should arrive sometime mid-spring.
